article.title: Ethiopia 2022/2023 First Quarter Revenue Report
article.description: The overall Federal government revenue in 2022/2023 was Birr 97.8 billion which was fully collected from domestic sources. Tax revenue accounted for about Birr 91.3 billion or 93.3 percent of domestic revenue and the remaining Birr 6.6 billion or 6.7 percent was generated from non-taxes.
